resources:
Sherlock 1. In "The Reichenbach Fall", whom does watson meet in the first scene?
His website manager His doctor His therapist His lawyer
2. Which character from \"Star Trek\" does Watson compare Sherlock to in "The Hounds of Baskerville"?
Scottie Spock Picard Data
3. At the beginning of episode 1, season 1, Watson is seen where?
Job Dentist\'s office Psychiatrist\'s office Publisher\'s office
4. In "The Blind Banker" what is the name of Zhi Zhu\'s sister?
Soo Tong Soo Lin Yao General Shan Mrs. Hu
5. When Watson first speaks of getting married, who says, "What's his name?"
DI Lestrade Mycroft Mrs. Hudson Sherlock
6. In "The Great Game", who begins investigating the case of Andrew West due to the unwillingness of Holmes?
Watson Mycroft Carl Powers Sarah Sawyer
7. In "The Blind Banker" what object is valued at nine million?
Diamond cat Qing pin Yellow dragon Jade pin
8. Which of these words does Henry Knight dream about in "The Hounds of Baskerville"?
Liberty Equality Sorority Fraternity
9. In \"His Last Vow"\, where does Magnussen relieve himself in Sherlock's flat?
Kitchen Persian slippers Fireplace Bedroom
10. What does Watson discover in the fridge in "The Great Game"? Cocaine Octopus A bowl A head#
Begin Ensure you answer all questions Your Score is Reset Submit
